price: Twaa-Siin; [1] iyo ni imirongo ya Qur’an ikaba n’igitabo gisobanutse (kinashyira ibintu ku mugaragaro).
arabic: طسٓۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَابٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes: [1] Twaa Siin Miim: Inyuguti nk’izi twazivuzeho mu masura yatambutse.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: tta-seen til'ka āyātu al-qur'āni wakitābin mubīnin
